Hmm... Never heard of anyone wishing a slow and painfull death to themselves before..

::Killfest::

Killfest sees the explosion out of the corner of his eyes, wishing he could at least stretch his limbs a bit.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Ramjet:::
> 
> ::When his cog gets blasted and his transformation is disabled, he wanted to 
> cry out in rage, but couldn't because of his current immobility.  But what he 
> could do was think.  And he vowed inside his mind that he would kill 
> Ignatius, and that he would die a slow, painful death::
